Title: The Fourth Horseman (2)
Plot: As the Ori plague spreads rapidly, SG-1 hopes that the Prior who caused the disease may hold the key to its cure. Gerak tries to rally the Jaffa to the Ori's cause, prompting Teal'c and Bra'tac to initiate a resistance.
GuestStars: Cameron Bright, Don S. Davis, Tony Amendola, Garry Chalk, Gary Jones, Lexa Doig, Louis Gossett Jr.
